attributes.action: Offer half price fuel to any transport company which agrees to restrict travel by their trucks to the hours between 9pm and 6 am.The trucks could be painted in striped colours to avoid cheating.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many transport companies would glady use their trucks during limited hours during the night in return for half price fuel. This would also reduce a lot of the congestion found on the roads today.
